TopicTitle: Extra Launch sites from Making History...

Articles.Content:
In the new expansion it is of course possible to make new launch sites on other places (and presumably Kerbin, too) with the mission builder. Though I doubt it, is there any way to make more launch sites in career mode? (I.e. transfering that data from a saved mission, somehow. Seems impossible).

Thanks a bunch.
Not mobile launchsites. But you can implement Woomerang & the island airfield by clicking a button in the difficulty settings. I think you also have to upgrade the respective building to T2.
